articles.title: Structural basis of directional switching by the bacterial flagellum - Nature.com
articles.description: Cryoelectron microscopy analyses of the counter-clockwise and clockwise states of the Salmonella Typhimurium C-ring reveal the structural bases for changes in rotation of the bacterial flagellum.
